entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Celestial Legacy
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage. You also know the {@spell word of radiance|XGE} cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability.

entries.name: Healing Hands
entries: As an action, you can touch a creature and roll a number of d4s equal to your proficiency bonus. The creature regains a number of hit points equal to the total rolled. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Necrotic Shroud
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to turn into pools of darkness and two skeletal, ghostly, flightless wings to sprout from your back.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, creatures other than your allies within 10 feet of you that can see you must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or become {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn. Until the transformation ends, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra necrotic damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra damage equals your proficiency bonus.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Soul
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to glimmer and two luminous, incorporeal wings to sprout from your back.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed, and once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra damage equals your proficiency bonus.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Consumption
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing a searing light to radiate from you, pour out of your eyes and mouth, and threaten to char you.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, each creature within 10 feet of you takes radiant damage equal to your proficiency bonus. Until the transformation ends, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra damage equals your proficiency bonus.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance against poison damage.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Forgewise
entries: You gain proficiency with two of the following artisan's tools of your choice: Jeweler's Tools, Mason's Tools, Smith's Tools, or Tinker's Tools.

entries.name: Stonecunning
entries: As a bonus action, you gain tremorsense with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. You must be on a stone surface or touching such a surface to use this tremorsense. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: Sylvan Ancestry
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

entries.name: Trance
entries: You don't need to sleep. Instead, you can finish a long rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation, during which you retain consciousness.

entries.name: Blessings of the Sun
entries: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell color spray} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell scorching ray} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Blessings of the Moon
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell sleep} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell moonbeam} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Blessings of the Dark
entries: You know the {@spell dancing lights} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell faerie fire} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell darkness} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Mark of the Feywild
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
This trait gains an additional effect based on your season; if the effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier:

items.name: Autumn
items.entry: Immediately after you you teleport using this trait, up to two creatures of your choice that you can see within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you for 1 minute, or until you or your companions deal any damage to the creatures.

items.name: Winter
items.entry: When you teleport using this trait, one creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you before you teleport must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Spring
items.entry: When you teleport using this trait, you can touch one willing creature within 5 feet of you. That creature then teleports instead of you, appearing in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you.

items.name: Summer
items.entry: Immediately after you teleport using this trait, each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you takes fire damage equal to your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Mark of the Shadowfell
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
You also gain resistance to all damage when you teleport using this trait. The resistance lasts until the start of your next turn. During that time, you appear ghostly and translucent.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
entries: You have the ability to communicate in a limited manner with Beasts, Plants, and vegetation. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return. You have advantage on all Charisma checks you make to influence them.

entries.name: Hidden Step
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically turn invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Stampeding Step
entries: You can take the Dash action as a bonus action. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. Whenever you use this trait if you move at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be knocked {@condition prone}.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Unending Breath
entries: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you're not {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Elemental Legacy
entries: You have resistance to lightning damage. You also know the {@spell gust|XGE} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell feather fall} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell levitate} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Earth Walk
entries: You can move across difficult terrain without expending extra movement if you are using your walking speed on the ground or a floor.

entries.name: Elemental Legacy
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance against poison damage. You also know the {@spell mold earth|XGE} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell earth tremor|XGE} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell maximilian's earthen grasp|XGE} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Elemental Legacy
entries: You have resistance to fire damage. You also know the {@spell produce flame} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell burning hands} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell flame blade} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You breathe air and water.

entries.name: Elemental Legacy
entries: You have resistance to acid damage. You also know the {@spell acid splash} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell create or destroy water} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell water walk} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Gnomish Magic Resistance
entries: You have advantage on all Wisdom, Intelligence, and Charisma saves against spells.

entries.name: Gift of Knowledge
entries: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Religion}. If you are already proficient in your chosen skill you instead have expertise, which means your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make with it.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Gifted Wanderer
entries: You gain proficiency with one tool, instrument, gaming set, or vehicle of your choice. In addition, you gain fluency in one language of your choice.

entries.name: Planar Vagabonds
entries: Foreigners to this world, the goblins traveled as four separate tribes across the elemental plane after the destruction of their home. Their god split their essence among four powerful artifacts to aid each tribe's expedition in finding a new home. Only three of the four tribes, however, have successfully made it to the world, and the artifacts have been lost in the multitude of conflicts since their arrival.

Many groups of goblins travel the world as vagrants looking to find the long-lost artifacts while picking up work along the way as merchants, mercenaries, or performers. Other goblins have completely given up the dream of their ancestors and have settled as small families in cities, taking up the professions of common folk.

entries.name: Fury of the Small
entries: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your proficiency bonus. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all expended uses when you finish a long rest, and you can use it no more than once per turn.

entries.name: Nimble Escape
entries: You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

entries.name: Hobgoblin Magic
entries: You know the {@spell prestidigitation} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell absorb elements|XGE} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell enhance ability} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Hobgoblin Magic Resistance
entries: You have advantage on all Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves against spells.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Sneaky
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Stealth} skill. In addition, without squeezing, you can move through and stop in a space large enough for a Small creature.

entries.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If you hit a creature with an attack roll, the creature takes an extra 2d6 damage if it hasn't taken a turn yet in the current combat.

entries.name: Natural Athlete
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} skill.

entries.name: Mountain Born
entries: You have resistance to cold damage. You also naturally acclimate to high altitudes, even if you've never been to one. This includes elevations above 20,000 feet.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Stone's Endurance
entries: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a {@dice d12}. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled and reduce the damage by that total. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

entries.name: Innate Luck
entries: When you make an ability check, attack, or saving throw you can choose to roll with advantage. You can use this trait a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus (rounded down), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Stealth} skill. In addition, you can attempt to hide even when you are only obscured by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

entries.name: Expert Duplication
entries: When you copy writing or craftwork produced by yourself or someone else, you have advantage on any ability checks you make to produce an exact duplicate.

entries.name: Kenku Recall
entries: You have proficiency in two skills of your choice. Moreover, when you make an ability check using any skill in which you have proficiency, you can give yourself advantage before rolling. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries: You can accurately mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations only with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check against a DC of 8 + your Charisma ({@skill Deception}) modifier.

entries.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: You were created to have remarkable fortitude, represented by the following benefits:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.
You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance to poison damage.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.
You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep.

entries.name: Specialized Design
entries: You gain one skill proficiency and one tool proficiency of your choice.

entries.name: Vigilant Rest
entries: When you take a long rest, you must spend at least six hours in an inactive, motionless state, rather than sleeping. In this state, you appear inert, but it doesn't render you {@condition unconscious}, and you can see and hear as normal.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Otherworldly Presence
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability.

entries.name: Infernal Legacy
entries: You have resistance to fire damage. You also know the {@spell fire bolt} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell hellish rebuke} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell darkness} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Abyssal Legacy
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance against poison damage. You also know the {@spell poison spray} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell ray of sickness} spell once. Starting at 5th level, you gain the ability to cast the {@spell hold person} spell once. You must finish a long rest or spend a spell slot of the appropriate level to cast these spells again. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

trait.name: Extraordinary Leap
entries: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to move 3 feet.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Sticky Leg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). The steeder can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.

trait.name: Extraordinary Leap
entries: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to jump 3 feet.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Sticky Leg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. {@h}The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). The steeder can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.
